Zhang Yang and Da Chun were stunned, Da Chun said, "Xia Luo, you're doing well," Xia Luo said, "I was just wondering who was driving around here in circles."

Xia Luo said: "I was just wondering who was driving around here in circles." Little Brother-in-law got out of the car, and Zhang Yang pointed at him, cursing: "Little Brother-in-law, you little bastard!"
Xia Luo said, "Everything I did today was for the one secretly hidden in my heart. Her name is Qiu Ya."
Xia Luo continues, "Everything I did today was for the one secretly hidden in my heart. Her name is Qiu Ya."
Xia Luo continues, '"I want to have a moment of brilliance on her most important day and then disappear forever, becoming the unattainable idol in her life."
Xia Luo continues, "I want to have a moment of brilliance on her most important day and then disappear forever, becoming the unattainable idol in her life."
Xia Luo, dressed in a suit, walked in, and Master of Ceremonies said, "This esteemed colleague, did you walk into the wrong room?"
Xia Luo looked at the full glass of red wine, his eyes gleaming. Zhang Yang asked Yuan Hua: "Yuan Hua, can you improvise a poem for Xia Luo's outfit?"
Yuan Hua says: "Never mind." Zhang Yang says: "Come on, come on, give us one!" Yuan Hua says: "Alright, I'll try." "A lone banquet guest, feathered outfit—all classmates, hence feathered attire."
Yuan Hua said: "Alright, I'll try." "A lone banquet guest, feathered outfit—all classmates, hence feathered attire."
Xia Luo picked up the wine glass and handed it to Old Wang, Old Wang said: "Classmates, how have you been?"
Da Chun said: "Old Wang, I heard you were expelled from school for accepting gifts, and yet you still had the face to come here."
Zhang Yang said: "That New Year's, my dad brought over a Sony radio for you." Old Wang said: "Zhang Yang, a teacher can never forget." Zhang Yang said: "Old Wang, my dad sent a television, Yuan Hua."
Old Wang said: "Still as talented as ever." Da Chun said: "Teacher, I gave you a calendar." Old Wang said: "The teacher can't remember that." "I don't hold grudges." "You all have changed so much."
Meng Te, with a smile, walked up to Old Wang and said: "Old Wang, I'm Meng Te. I go by Meng Te Jiao now." Old Wang smiled and invited Meng Te to sit.
Old Wang and Zhang Yang sat down, and Zhang Yang said: "To be honest, the student I remember most from your class is that fool, Xia Luo. What is that idiot doing now?"
Old Wang said: "To be honest, the student I remember most from your class is that fool, Xia Luo. What is that idiot doing now?"

movie101_6965768652251628068_2580_2760.text: Xia Luo: "I will buy out this title of 'your brother'" "Xia Luo, Xia Luo" "Da Chun asked me to save you" "Little sis, you are pretty strong"
Xia Luo looked at the people in front of him and said: "What are you doing here? Hurry up and leave. This has nothing to do with you. Go."
Xia Luo: "She's my neighbor, bro." Winter Mei: "Xia Luo, how can you hang out with these hooligans?" Xia Luo: "Say that again."
Xia Luo looked at Winter Mei and said, "How can you become like this?"
Chen Kai: "How can you talk to a girl like that, fucker?" "Don't be afraid, little sis." "Are you holding a big toothpick to clean your brother's teeth?"

Winter Mei said: "Don't come any closer." "Fat ass all greasy." "Shameless." "Phooey." Chen Kai was infuriated and wanted to hit Winter Mei, but Winter Mei grabbed a stick and pointed it at Chen Kai's crotch.
Winter Mei asked: "Where are you going?" "Put me down, let go of me!"

Xia Luo, who was about to get up, was kicked in the head by Chen Kai. The gang members surrounded Xia Luo and started beating him. At this moment, Winter Mei rushed over and hugged Xia Luo's waist, taking the hit himself. Xia Luo tried to break free but was thrown to the ground.

Xia Luo, who was lying on the ground, got up and kicked the thug in the chest. The thug, who was knocked down, got up and said, "What are you doing?" Xia Luo kicked him again, and the thug fell to the ground. Chen Kai, who was standing, kicked Xia Luo in the chest. Xia Luo, who was hit, fell to the ground. Chen Kai kicked him again, and Xia Luo fell to the ground.

Xia Luo, who was holding Winter Mei, slowly opened his eyes, and the scene before him was a black and white memory. In the memory, a boy with a bruised face was being bullied by a gang of boys. The boy who was bullied turned out to be Xia Luo. The memory ended, and the scene returned to the present. The crowd was jeering, and Winter Mei's mother was crying uncontrollably.
Teacher Wang looked at the people in front of him and said: "Stop." The crowd immediately advanced towards him. Teacher Wang said: "I told you to get lost earlier, did you get lost? Huh?"

Teacher Wang, who was standing aside, walked over and pressed down on the fat man's stomach. The fat man cried out in pain. Teacher Wang then released his hand. The fat man, still groaning, charged forward. Teacher Wang kicked him in the chest, sending him flying. The fat man, stunned, stood up and looked at Teacher Wang, who was pointing at him, cursing him with a face full of anger.
Teacher Wang: "You still remember what I taught you, huh?" "I only taught you this," "What is this, what kind of hair is this?"
Chen Kai, who was sitting on the ground, stood up and looked at the sharp wooden stick in Teacher Wang's hand. He reached out to grab it, but Teacher Wang pulled it back.
Teacher Wang pushed away Chen Kai's hand, and Chen Kai turned around, crying. Xia Luo and Winter Mei looked at each other, and Xia Luo said, "Thank you, Teacher Wang."
Xia Luo said, "Teacher Wang, I didn't know you could fight like this. Why didn't you fight back that time?"
Teacher Wang said, 'Nonsense, I'm a teacher.' Xia Luo said, 'Actually, I think Teacher Wang is quite cool.' Teacher Wang rode away on his bike.

Xia Luo rode away, and Winter Mei chased after him, shouting, 'Xia Luo, Xia Luo, wait for me.' Xia Luo stopped and said, 'Can you stop following me?' Winter Mei continued, 'Xia Luo, wait for me. Listen to me, Xia Luo.' 'Xia Luo, wait.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_2760_2940.text: Ma Dongmei chased after Xia Luo and asked: 'Xia Luo, wait for me Xia Luo', 'Xia Luo, tell me, do you like Qiu Ya or not'
Xia Luo said: 'Yes, I like Qiu Ya, the whole school knows, and I've made it clear to you, Ma Dongmei, there's no chance between us.'
Xia Luo said: 'You misunderstood, that was because I couldn't stand them, it has nothing to do with you, don't flatter yourself.'
Ma Dongmei said: 'Fine, just tell me you hate me now and I will disappear from your life forever.'

Xia Luo said: 'I don't hate you.' Ma Dongmei turned around and left, and Xia Luo chased after her, saying, 'I said I don't hate you.' Xia Luo followed Ma Dongmei to a pavilion, where he turned around and looked at the distant scenery.

The scene shifts to the basketball court, where Yuan Hua is playing a game of one-on-one with Da Chun. The two are in a stalemate, neither willing to concede defeat.

Yuan Hua, with a face full of disdain, looked up at the sky and then at Ma Dongmei, who was standing opposite him with a victorious smile.
Qiu Ya, who was originally on the stage, stepped down to the ground after hearing this. Qiu Ya's foot stepped on a stone, and Qiu Ya said, "Pretending to be innocent is exhausting."
Xia Luo sat on the steps and began to play the guitar and sing. The students gathered around, cheering and hopping.
Meng Te sang passionately: 'The chrysanthemums are wilted, the chrysanthemums are hurt, your smile is the most beautiful.'

movie101_6965768652251628068_2940_3120.text: Da Chun touched his head and said, "I was wrong, I was wrong."
Ma Dongmei said, "Don't insult my idol, get lost." Da Chun picked up the flowers and walked away. Ma Dongmei said, "You think you could chase after me? A toad lusting after swan's flesh."

Ma Dongmei, holding a sunflower, turned around and saw Xia Luo sitting on the rooftop, playing the guitar. She smiled and walked towards Xia Luo. Xia Luo stood up and ran after her, but accidentally bumped into a passing group of thugs. The thugs chased Xia Luo, shouting, 'Thug life!'

Ma Dongmei ran into the nightclub, where a man was being beaten up. The man said, 'Honestly, big brother, I just took a beating, let’s talk things out properly, shall we? Can we talk it through in a bit?'

Lei Luo got out of the car and Piggy said, "Lei Luo bro, you're late." Lei Luo replied, "Busy, you know." Piggy continued, "Yan Tong is so stingy, you know."

Lei Luo said: 'This generous gift can't be considered stingy, right?' Piggy said: 'Wow, big spender.' 'He'll be so happy he'll drool, let's go.' The two walked into the shop, and the waiter said: 'Upstairs, please.'

Lei Luo said: "It's just a birthday, but they've made it look like the Queen's birthday." Lei Luo and Piggy arrived at the banquet hall, Piggy said: "Lei Luo bro is here to celebrate Yan Tong sir's birthday." Lei Luo said: "Ah, Lei Luo, now that you’ve been promoted to detective, you're so busy." Lei Luo replied: "It's alright."
Lei Luo said: "It's for Yan Tong sir." Yan Tong's Wife said: "Take it over yourself, I won't serve you." Lei Luo said: "No need to be formal."

Lei Luo said, "Wow, no wonder they don't look at you directly. Turns out there's so much their mom could open a gold shop." Piggy said, "This isn't about money." Lei Luo said, "Then put it there." Piggy said, "Of course, I want it to be obvious. If you're not convinced, bite me."
Lei Luo picked up the box and walked over, Piggy followed behind him. Lei Luo said, 'Move aside,' and then pushed through the crowd to sit down.
Officer Officer Hunter said: "Sit down, Officer Officer Hunter wants to play with you." Lei Luo and Piggy exchanged glances and then sat down.
Yan Tong said: "He's interesting." "He always behaves like this when he’s drunk." "Gamble, gamble, gamble." "Wow, lucky you."
Officer Hunter said, "Pay up, come on!" "That's right, be careful or you’ll lose it all." "It's yours, you have it too."
Officer Hunter, with a cigarette in his mouth, said, "Who's the boss now, huh?"
Officer Hunter said: "What, do Brits not have to repay gambling losses?" Officer Hunter, who was about to hit Lei Luo, was stopped by Piggy.
Yan Tong said, 'What are you doing, you're drunk.' Lei Luo pushed Piggy away and took out his phone to call Officer Hunter. Yan Tong said, 'Take the officer to wash his face.'
Yan Tong walked over and said, "You just got promoted to detective and you're showing off?" "Daring to hit an officer?"
Yan Tong said: 'So you're acting tough even in Yau Ma Tei? Do you want to manage Wan Chai? Are you daring enough to hit me too?'
Lei Luo said, 'Let's go.' Piggy said, 'We're leaving, happy birthday.' Lei Luo said, 'Don't be angry, let's go dance, ah, I'll go with you!'

Lei Luo said: 'What? Let go, let go, I'm fine, I'm fine.' 'If it weren't for you, I would’ve shot him.' Piggy said: 'Patience, revenge can wait ten years. A little impatience spoils great plans. Think of it as constipation, bear with it.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_2580_2760.text: Ah Mui, who was about to reach the shore, was caught off guard and dragged back into the water by a man in black.
The scene shifts to the deep sea, where Ah Mui, having lost his life, floats around aimlessly with the current, while A Hao, having regained his life, swims towards Ah Mui.
The car drove to the destination. A Hao and his brothers got out of the car. A Hao said, "Sister-in-law, how could this happen! How could there be a death! I want to take them home."
Piggy said, "Sister-in-law, how could this happen! How could there be a death! I want to take them home."
A Hao, lying on the ground, said, "Why is this happening? Why? Why? Why?"
Ah Mui, lying on the ground, said, 'Why is this happening? Why, why, why?'
A Qi, who was standing, sat down, and the crowd fell silent.
A Qi, who was standing not far away, walked over with a smile, then squatted down beside A Hao.

A Hao, holding Ah Mui, slowly closes his eyes, feeling the warmth of Ah Mui's head against his chest, A Hao's lips move slightly, as if he is about to cry. The night is silent, only the sound of A Hao's heavy breathing can be heard.
The screen goes black, and the scene shifts to a restaurant. A man says, 'Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang's behavior is getting more extreme.'

Lei Luo said, "Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang's behavior is getting more extreme. There was a big fight a while ago, and now they are fighting guerrilla wars. Recently, more than twenty people were killed, and fifty many were injured. The superiors are not happy."
Lei Luo said, "A good cocaine business, made into a pot of porridge, how to eat?" Lei Luo poured the porridge into a cup, and Piggy stared at it without moving.
Lei Luo said, "You want to overturn him, clean up, and start again." Piggy said, "That's what I mean." Lei Luo said, "If you really uproot it, wouldn't Fei Zai Chao become dominant?"
Lei Luo said, "If Fei Zai Chao listens to me obediently, leave him a share, find two people, take the positions of Big Gray Bear and Gong Zi Qiang."

Hua Zi Rong and his wife were lying on the bed when Piggy suddenly opened the door. Hua Zi Rong immediately said, "You really are a good brother. When Big Gray Bear went to gamble in Temple Street, you took the opportunity to show up."

Big Gray Bear, naked, sitting in the bathtub, covered in blood. He opened his mouth wide, clutching his chest, and blood flowed out from his mouth and down his body. He fell backward into the bathtub, his body sliding down.

The scene shifts to the bathroom, where Piggy is sitting in the bathtub, holding a hair dryer and pressing it against his head. The hair dryer's heat is unbearable for Piggy, who is already red-faced and in extreme pain.

Lei Luo said, “It’s easier to kill Big Gray Bear who is courageous but reckless, but Gong Zi Qiang is the nephew of Ding Ye, the old city fortress. If you touch him, I'm afraid Kowloon District will be chaotic.”

movie101_6973286990817002015_2760_2940.text: Lei Luo said: "No, no, no, it's too dangerous." "If you go in like this" "What if they turn hostile?" "Let's ask A Hao for help."

A Hao, who was sitting on the sofa, heard the noise and looked at the two people who came over. He said to the man in white, "You short-lived fool, do you think we're talking nonsense?"

Lei Luo laughed and said: "Rest assured, we got this. As long as that SOB dares to come in alone, I'll take him out. Don't worry."

Piggy said: "Master Ding trusts me the most. After today, you won't see Lei Luo again." Piggy's henchman replied: "All set." Piggy asked: "Do we really have to use this?" Piggy's henchman said: "Alright, alright, be tough."
Piggy said: "Better safe than sorry, nothing will happen. And even if something does, you won't get seriously hurt. Hurry up, thanks."
Lei Luo, while putting on his shirt, said, "What?" Piggy handed him a gun, and Lei Luo continued, "A gun?" Piggy explained, "I know, I know this is a gun. But what is this?"

Piggy nodded and said: "Alright, whatever you say." Piggy nodded in agreement, and the two left the police station separately. The scene shifted to the street, where Piggy drove a small car into the alley.
Lei Luo and his men followed closely behind. Piggy said to Lei Luo: "I'll wait for you here. If anything happens, send the signal. I'll rush in immediately."
Lei Luo walked at the front, with a determined look, followed by David and others.
Lei Luo said: "Everyone, pay attention." The group walked into a corridor, and a shirtless man was standing at the stairway entrance.

Xiao Wei, who had been hiding in the corridor, returned to the laundry shop. He walked up to the group and said: "All of Gong Zai Qiang's people have returned to the city, they're armed, and many from Brother Chao's side went in as well."
Xiao Wei said: "All of Gong Zai Qiang's people have returned to the city," "They're armed," "Many from Brother Chao's side went in as well."
Xiao Wei, who was squatting on the ground, stood up and walked towards the door.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2940_3120.text: Lei Luo and his men followed closely behind. The group arrived at a tea house, where A Hao was sitting in a room smoking a cigarette. Lei Luo sat on a chair nearby, fanning himself and watching A Hao.

Lei Luo and his men followed closely behind. The scene shifted to Dingye's restaurant. Dingye sat on a chair, fanning himself with a palm-leaf fan, his face full of smiles. Lei Luo sat on a chair, fanning himself with a handkerchief, his face full of anger.

Zhang Xiaobao followed behind Liu Mengting, the two of them walked through the tea garden and came to a small village. The village was deserted, only an old man was sitting on a chair at the door of his house.
The scene shifts to the kitchen, where Liu Mengting is making tea. She places the tea kettle on the stove and wipes away the dust on it.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting went to the kitchen, picked up the medicine, and said, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting said, "Okay, I got it!" Liu Mengting fed Auntie He the porridge, and Zhang Xiaobao continued taking photos.
Zhang Xiaobao: "Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too. Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."

Chun Hu said: "Alright, alright, Auntie He." Chun Hu handed the turtle to Auntie He and said: "Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?" Auntie He said: "Much better!" Chun Hu said: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He said: 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

Auntie He: 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

The villagers gathered around the notice board, reading the notice which said: "Notice for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization. According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang, sitting in the office, laughed heartily after seeing it. Director said: "Bao Liang ah, you didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang said: "Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi."
Director said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch. Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."

Bao Liang asked Director how business was going. Director replied modestly that business was not too great. Bao Liang laughed and said, "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "The richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."

Bao Liang said: "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."

Director said, "Bao Liang ah, this timing isn't right. We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, people will think I'm favoring you."
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Bao Liang asked: "Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?" Director replied: "Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."
